item.title: Tourist Typology
item.description: Tourist typology computes and visualizes a dynamic user clustering of tourists based on image ratings.

item.title: Air Support
item.description: Air Support is a digital assistant for optimal control of indoor air quality, which I am implementing as a product of my master’s thesis.

item.description: FlexPowerHub is a Software as a Service for energy trading which allows professional users to market their capacities individually and automatically.

item.title: Expo Generator
item.description: Expo Generator is a SaaS product that allows you to create apps in the browser without any technical knowledge.
